msIdentifier.repository: Kislak Center for Special Collections, Rare Books and Manuscripts
msIdentifier.idno: Misc Mss Box 24 Folder 4 Box 24 Folder 4

msContents.summary: Two leaves from the same Qurʼān, though not continuous. Leaf 1 contains the last two words of verse 5 of al-Takāthur (102) through the first two words of verse 6 of al-Humazah (104) . Leaf 2 contains all of al-Kāfirūn (190) except the bismillāh, to the penultimate word of verse 4 of al-Masad (111), called Tabbat yadā here.

supportDesc.foliation: Western numeral foliation in pencil added, upper left recto.

scriptDesc.scriptNote: Written in naskh in black ink, pointed, vocalized. Headers in thuluth.

origin.p: Probably copied in the 16th or 17th century, place unknown.
